backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Contains metadata describing the feature change removing the disclaimer text from the landing page footer and its related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists pre-generated summaries for all frontend files in the project.
frontend/index.css: Root Tailwind CSS variables and base styles defining light/dark themes and core design tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component composing all landing page sections, sticky header, footer, and mobile CTA bar.
frontend/src/components/CtaButton.tsx: Reusable Buy Now CTA button linking to the affiliate URL with size variants and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing copyright and caffeine.ai attribution with tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/MobileStickyCtaB: Mobile-only sticky bottom bar containing a full-width CTA button.
frontend/src/components/sections/Benefit: Section listing six digestive support benefits with icons, an image, and a CTA button.
frontend/src/components/sections/FaqSect: Accordion-style FAQ list with eight expandable questions and answers.
frontend/src/components/sections/FinalCt: Final CTA section with urgency messaging, product image, and large Buy Now button.
frontend/src/components/sections/Formula: Renders a section showcasing GutOptimâ€™s key ingredients with icons and an image.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Displays the hero banner with headline, benefits, CTA button, and product image.
frontend/src/components/sections/Problem: Presents common digestive issues and positions GutOptim as a supportive solution with an image and CTA.
frontend/src/components/sections/Testimo: Lists customer testimonials with star ratings, supporting imagery, and a CTA button.
frontend/src/components/sections/TrustQu: Shows trust badges for quality, security, facility, and shipping along with a supporting image.
frontend/src/components/StickyHeader.tsx: Sticky top navigation bar with logo, smooth-scroll menu, mobile menu, and CTA button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login, and stored identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, and utility classes for layout and component styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom color tokens, container settings, animations, and typography/container-query plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state and requirements for building a GutOptim affiliate landing page, including design rules, CTA behavior, and section specifications.
